title: Death Anniversary of Martin Luther King, Jr.  Bill Cosby is still making headlines.  Does Steve make a comeback, Closing Remarks and more!
itunes:title: Death Anniversary of Martin Luther King, Jr.  Bill Cosby is still making headlines.  Does Steve make a comeback, Closing Remarks and more!
description:
Today marks the 50th Anniversary of MLK's death. Steve contemplates making a comeback to stand up comedy. Bill Cosby is still making headlines. Big Dog has a story (Trapped in a Bathroom) and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
